channel.title: Can I recover my wallet wih only key1.private and key1.share?
channel.description:
Hi everybody,
All I have now from my bitbay wallet is a backup from 30/08/2019 with files : key1.private, key1.share, key2.private, key2.share and ContractsBackup.dat.
I tried to install the new wallet but don't see any way to recover ?
Is there a way to restore my wallet with that. I tried an importprivkey in the console with the private key I find in Key1.private, but the key is not recognised.
![BitBayForumQuestion|600x149](upload://wMI9O9jmC1s6e7mwccsm1i55SZJ.jpeg)
Any way I can recover? Any help welcome. Thanks.

item.title: Can I recover my wallet wih only key1.private and key1.share?
item.dc:creator: @meeekz
item.description:
@meeekz wrote:

I have the same issue. How to recover?

Read full topic
